Invest

Delivering Your
Business Needs

As we aim to realize our vision to be a leader in the development of global technology hubs, we ensure that setting up investments in Cyberjaya is made easy. We provide investor relations services through our very own Investor Services so expansion regionally is never a problem.

Our services in this area include facilitation of tailor-made fiscal incentives, smooth and transparent facilitation in regulatory matters, business-matching for those looking into diversification and new strategic partnerships, site-selection assistance and talent facilitation.

Need Help Deciding?

If you need help to decide, we are here to understand your requirements and facilitate your business needs by providing you options and advice

Ready to move in?

Count us in! We provide facilitation of business registrations, talent, site selection, clients, connection with government agencies and stakeholders, as well as Cyberjaya specific information, so you can get started on setting up your business right away!

Sit back and settle down

Set up your business and relax - we’ve got you covered. Get your staff oriented with Cyberjaya through our Induction Programme, grab exciting opportunities to pilot innovations in Cyberjaya, collaborate with the Tech Communities, and connect with Cyberjaya stakeholders.

Facilitation In Regulatory Matters

We want your first steps to be fuss free, and that’s why we provide advice on the procedures of setting up business in Cyberjaya, documentations needed and connect you with relevant agencies.

Site Selection

Who better to show you around town than the Cyberjaya experts themselves? We analyse the multiple requirements of your company to provide the best space that can accommodate your workforce.

Go on a site visit with us so you can select from our own list of spaces or even other office spaces within Cyberjaya.

Talent Facilitation

It’s not about what you know, it’s who you know.

We help connect companies in Cyberjaya with our university partners to provide them with brilliant and talented fresh graduates.

We also give you access to knowledge workers through our connection with government agencies such as MDec.

Business Matching & Strategic Partnership

There’s strength in numbers, and here in Cyberjaya, we have countless of SMES and startups from various backgrounds and expertise in our network that you can get connected to and engage with for local partnerships and technology solutions.

We also provide business-to-business platforms and help connect local businesses during trade missions from other countries.

Need to know more? Drop us a line!Contact Us
